docs.lead_paragraph: Inviting a child to enter our lives: would he accept? That is the question asked over and over at a fertility temple in Bhutan.

headline.seo: A Forgotten Prayer, Answered — Modern Love

docs.abstract: Charlotte Bacon Modern Love column describes how her visit to a fertility temple in Bhutan may have helped her conceive a healthy baby at the age of 44.
docs.snippet: Inviting a child to enter our lives: would he accept? That is the question asked over and over at a fertility temple in Bhutan.

docs.lead_paragraph: 9 P.M. (13) FROM VIENNA: THE NEW YEAR'S CELEBRATION 2012 Mariss Jansons, above, conducts the Vienna Philharmonic, accompanied by the Vienna Boys' Choir, in its annual concert of festive works by some native sons. Julie Andrews hosts this ''Great Performances'' presentation, broadcast from the Musikverein in Vienna. The program includes Johann Strauss Sr.'s ''Sperl Galopp'' and ''Radetzky March''; Josef Strauss's ''Fireproof'' and ''Burning Love''; Eduard Strauss's ''Carmen Quadrille''; Tchaikovsky's Panorama and Waltz from ''Sleeping Beauty''; and Johann Strauss Jr.'s ''On the Beautiful Blue Danube,'' the evening's traditional centerpiece. 7:20 A.M. (BBC America) ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS MARATHON Start the New Year on a lush note with Edina (Jennifer Saunders) and Patsy (Joanna Lumley) in this showing of all four seasons of this British comedy.
